definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 di4 zhen4 ju2

sentences.english: Chuan Wenchuan earthquake, the China Seismological Bureau has launched a plan.
sentences.chinese: 四川汶川地震发生后，中国地震局已启动一级预案。

sentences.english: Xu Daoyi, a retired researcher at China Seismology Administration, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 国家地震局地质所研究员徐道一同意宋正海的观点。
